Hi, I'm Abe.

I'm an economist transitioning to adept web and mobile developer--and coupling the combination with my skills as a data scientist. My skills are available on contract basis, or as full-time permanent hire.

In addition, I'm a fiction and television writer, a movie and TV enthusiast, husband, father, and all around good guy to have around.
